concept.title: stress
concept.shortdesc: Description of the phonex stress supplementary matcher.

conbody.p:
The stress supplementary matcher will query the detected syllable stress of a phone. The argument given to the plug-in must be one of the following characters:
1 - primary stress
2 - secondary stress
A - any stress
U - unstressed
The stress matcher has a short-hand withing phonex. The stress type may be specified after a ! character after a phone matcher.
